reviewText:
The BASERUNNING & BUNTING DRILLS dvd gives the viewer some very
refined techniques while on the bases and while bunting.
Key points for me were distinguishing the "square bunt" from the "pivot bunt"
and the benefits of each. Also the "delayed steal" which is explained in detail.
Interesting strategy is bunting with two strikes. A no no unless you make it work.
Recommended only for coaches with guts!

Not only should Little League coaches and parents view this exciting youth baseball resource, but players will benefit. Baserunning strategies are taught with detailed explanations and baseball common sense. Bunting techniques and when to use them work well. Combining these two subjects makes this a great and easy resource to watch. You may want to consider this baseball DVD set by Marty Schupak popular with Little League coaches and parents. Baseball Coaching:Schupak's Baseball Super 8 DVD Set These popular baseball titles by Marty Schupak are also available on Amazon's Video On Demand program for as low as $2.99. Hitting Drills & Techniques 59 Minute Baseball Practice Fielding Drills & Techniques Winning Baseball Strategies Pitching Drills & Techniques Drills & Techniques for Catchers Baserunning & Bunting Drills Infield Team Play & Strategies Backyard Baseball Drills

This is the best of Marty Schupak's baseball DVDs. The fundamentals shown for bunting are easy to follow and teach. The baserunning section will help any Little League team. Experienced coaches in league playoffs and All Star play will see the need for the skills and strategies addressed in this DVD. You may want to consider this baseball DVD set by Marty Schupak popular with Little League coaches and parents. Baseball Coaching:Schupak's Baseball Super 8 DVD Set Marty Schupak also produced popular DVDs in other sports available on Amazon. Soccer Coaching:Championship Soccer Drills For soccer coaches & parents. Basketball Coaching:48 Championship Basketball Drills For youth & school basketball coaches & parents. Ice Hockey Coaching:Championship Hockey Drills For ice hockey coaches & leagues. Golf Instruction:Backyard Golf For golfers looking to improve their game.

Our Little League team got extra runs, extra wins, extra confidence
and more, thanks to this ever so smart DVD.

Unlike a former major leaguer telling us youth baseball coaches how to do it, I love it when a fellow baseball coach shares his on field coaching experience. And when you want to know about baseball in its most fundamental and basic form... Marty Schupak is the name you turn to. You will love these baserunning strategies and bunting drills. Coaches who feel they have the personnel and might go somewhere in All Star competition, should review this product. This DVD coupled with his previous DVDs & book are perfect source documents to increase your baseball IQ. I highly recommend this DVD.

I cannot express how much I loved this DVD. Putting "small ball"
into my coaching strategies has made all the difference in the world with our team. We followed the techniques and drills at each and every practice spending 10-15 minutes on baserunning and bunting. Many of my players did not catch on right away and a few will never get it! But around the middle of the season we were bunting, doing the delayed steal and really became a different team! This DVD made an impact on our team. The results were obvious to other teams. It is rewarding when players grasp a baseball skill after some hard work (and fun)!

Wow! What a great video with excellent aggressive ideas. BASERUNNING & BUNTING DRILLS insists coaches can get 1-2 extra runs per game if they practice baserunning and bunting. Strategies like the BUNT MAN ON THIRD, almost guarantee a run as long as you practice. The BOUNCE & RUN DRILL puts players in the position on the base paths to get to the next base using great fundamental techniques. The bunting drills are by far the best I've seen. This stuff works! Coaches and parents who long for fundamentals in baseball will have a blast with this video. Anyone involved in youth baseball who eats, drinks & sleeps this stuff will not be disappointed.
VERY HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

I was fortunate that when I began coaching youth sports, the first video I got was one by Marty Schupak. I got hooked on his philosophies and saw incredible individual and team results! He came up to Massachusetts to do a coaches clinic and I cleared my schedule to attend. One of the main reasons for going was to hear his approach to baserunning and bunting. Not to be disappointed, he spoke about a lot of the material in this video. He is convincing about getting 1-2 extra runs per game if you practice baserunning and bunting at every practice. I remember him saying,

" if you practice baserunning & bunting at every practice, you'll be the only coach in your league that does it. You'll see results as the season goes on."

The video itself is one of the best resources I ever purchased. He goes through the techniques with the pivot bunt and the square bunt. He prefers the pivot bunt and gives concrete reasons but adds that if your players prefer the square bunt, let them do it.
The video combines clearly explained techniques with some very creative drills.

The baserunning part of the video is outstanding. He gives explanations about spending time each and every practice going over baserunning techniques. The drills he gives you will keep your players from getting bored.

The proof of the pudding is that our team looked to be a .500 team and we finished 14-6. We got at least two and maybe three extra wins because of our improved baserunning and bunting. This is a great youth baseball resource.

A DEFINITE 5 STAR VIDEO!
